core_meaning: Sextile between Venus and Moon opens opportunity/skill. Venus: affection, art, harmony, pleasure, values. Moon: emotion, care, habits, home, public mood, mother. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

facets.career: Design, branding, client harmony, tasteful presentation.  Public reception, brand sentiment, consistency. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.relationships: Attraction, diplomacy, reciprocity.  Bonding, nurturance, emotional safety. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.money: Luxury/beauty revenues, pricing power via desirability.  Cyclic cashflow, consumer sentiment. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.
facets.health_adj: Glucose balance, skin, reproductive health; moderation.  Hydration, sleep, digestion; stress sensitivity. Emphasis: opportunity/skill.

risk_notes: Complacency or overextension; assuming goodwill covers weak execution.
People-pleasing → scope creep; set clear give-and-get.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: opportunity/skill).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: opportunity/skill).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: opportunity/skill).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: opportunity/skill).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: opportunity/skill).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Venus: design, harmonize, price; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: opportunity/skill).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Venus Sextile Moon
en.core: Sextile between Venus and Moon opens opportunity/skill. Venus: affection, art, harmony, pleasure, values. Moon: emotion, care, habits, home, public mood, mother. General tenor: supportive, opportunity-rich; progress with modest effort.

hi.title: Venus Sextile Moon (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Venus और Moon का Sextile — ऊर्जा opportunity/skill के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
